display.name: Data Pump jobs
display.description: This report lists Data Pump jobs from DBA_DATAPUMP_JOBS--click on the parent record to get started.

query.sql: select :B_CREATED_SINCE as dte_min_created, :B_CREATED_DAYS as dte_min_days, :B_OWNER_LIKE as owner_like, :B_OWNER_REGEXP as owner_regexp, :B_JOBNAME_LIKE as jobname_like, :B_JOBNAME_REGEXP as jobname_regexp, :B_OPERATION as operation, nvl(:B_LOGFILE_HEAD, 200) as log_head_lines, nvl(:B_LOGFILE_TAIL, 1000) as log_tail_lines from dual

bind.tooltip: Min creation time of the master table (YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS)
Show only jobs created since the specified number of days
LIKE pattern for matching the job owner (CI)
Regular expression for matching the job owner (CI)
LIKE pattern for matching the job name (CI)
Regulat expression for matching the job name (CI)
Show only the specified operations (export | import)

bind.prompt: Max lines shown from log at head?
bind.tooltip: This limits the # of lines shown from the logfile at the head end (default: 200)

bind.prompt: Max lines shown from log at tail?
bind.tooltip: This limits the # of lines shown from the logfile at the tail end (default: 1000)

display.name: Data Pump jobs
display.tooltip: List of matching Data Pump jobs

query.sql: select d.*, e.last_analyzed, :LOG_HEAD_LINES as log_head_lines, :LOG_TAIL_LINES as log_tail_lines from (select b.*, c.created as master_table_created from (select a.owner_name, a.job_name, trim(a.operation) as operation, trim(a.job_mode) as job_mode, a.state, a.degree, a.attached_sessions, a.datapump_sessions from dba_datapump_jobs a where (:OWNER_LIKE is null or upper(a.owner_name) like upper(:OWNER_LIKE)) and (:OWNER_REGEXP is null or regexp_like(a.owner_name, :OWNER_REGEXP, 'i')) and (:JOBNAME_LIKE is null or upper(a.job_name) like upper(:JOBNAME_LIKE)) and (:JOBNAME_REGEXP is null or regexp_like(a.job_name, :JOBNAME_REGEXP, 'i')) and (:OPERATION is null or upper(trim(a.operation)) = upper(trim(:OPERATION))) ) b, dba_objects c where b.owner_name = c.owner (+) and b.job_name = c.object_name (+) and c.object_type (+) = 'TABLE' ) d, dba_tables e where :LOG_HEAD_LINES is not null and (:DTE_MIN_CREATED is null or d.master_table_created >= to_date(:DTE_MIN_CREATED, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) and (:DTE_MIN_DAYS is null or d.master_table_created >= trunc(sysdate, 'DDD') - to_number(:DTE_MIN_DAYS)) and d.owner_name = e.owner (+) and d.job_name = e.table_name (+) order by least(d.datapump_sessions, 1) desc, least(d.attached_sessions, 1) desc, decode(d.operation, 'EXPORT', 1, 'IMPORT', 2, 3) asc, d.master_table_created desc nulls last, d.owner_name, d.job_name

item.title: Gather stats...
item.help: This enables to gather statistics on the job's master table.

confirmation.title: Statistics gathered
confirmation.sql: select to_char(last_analyzed, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as dte_last_analyzed from dba_tables where owner = q'#"OWNER_NAME"#' and table_name = q'#"JOB_NAME"#'
confirmation.prompt: Statistics on #"OWNER_NAME"#.#"JOB_NAME"# gathered; last analyzed time: #0.DTE_LAST_ANALYZED#

item.title: Kill job...
item.help: This will stop the Data Pump job, then drop the master table.

confirmation.title: Data Pump job killed
confirmation.sql: select case when a.cnt_job = 0 then 'Job "' || q'#"JOB_NAME"#' || '" killed' else 'Please check DBA_DATAPUMP_JOBS' end as kill_outcome, case when a.cnt_mt = 0 then ' (master table dropped)' else ' (master table retained)' end as drop_mt_outcome from (select (select count(*) from dba_datapump_jobs where owner_name = q'#"OWNER_NAME"#' and job_name = q'#"JOB_NAME"#' ) as cnt_job, (select count(*) from dba_tables where owner = q'#"OWNER_NAME"#' and table_name = q'#"JOB_NAME"#' ) as cnt_mt from dual ) a

display.name: Logfile
display.tooltip: Contents of the logfile of the job

query.sql: select case when sqlcode < 0 then 'SQLDEV:GAUGE:0:100:100:100:0' -- Red when sqlcode = 100 then 'SQLDEV:GAUGE:0:100:0:0:0' -- Green when sqlcode is null and sqlerrm is not null then 'SQLDEV:GAUGE:0:100:0:100:0' -- Orange end as wl , lineno as line# , text as log_text , sqlerrm as note , file# , filepath , :OWNER_NAME as owner_name , :JOB_NAME as job_name from table( c##pkg_pub_textfile_viewer.datapump_job_log_text( :OWNER_NAME, :JOB_NAME , p_head_limit => :LOG_HEAD_LINES , p_tail_limit => :LOG_TAIL_LINES )) where :OWNER_NAME is not null
